p: In muscle tissue, GST activity of all groups increased compared to control group and the highest value was found in D2 group. In liver, activities of D3, D4 and D5 groups were found to increase compared to control, and D4 group showed the highest GST enzyme activity. The difference in D2 group was not significant. GST activity of D3 group in kidney tissue increased compared to control, while decrease was detected in D2, D4 and D5 groups ( Figure 4).
